personal.name: Sayyed Arslaan
personal.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
personal.headline: I Build Stunning Websites That Convert
personal.subtitle: Hi, I'm Sayyed Arslaan, a full-stack web developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences.
personal.bio: With over 2 years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating modern, responsive websites that not only look stunning but also drive results. My expertise spans from front-end technologies like React and Vue.js to back-end solutions with Node.js and Python.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: Creating beautiful, user-friendly designs that capture your brand essence.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building fast, scalable websites with modern technologies and best practices.

services.title: SEO Optimization
services.description: Improving your website's visibility and ranking in search engines.

services.title: E-Commerce Setup
services.description: Complete e-commerce solutions from design to payment integration.

services.title: Custom Web Apps
services.description: Tailored web applications to solve your specific business needs.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: Sayyed delivered an exceptional website that exceeded our expectations. The attention to detail and technical expertise is outstanding.

testimonials.content: Working with Sayyed was a pleasure. He understood our vision and transformed it into a beautiful, functional website.

testimonials.content: The website Sayyed created for us has significantly improved our online presence and client engagement. Highly recommended!
